cannotOpenFile: Cannot open the file at path {{path}}
childNotFound: {{parent}} does not have a child named {{child}}
nameAlreadyUsed: The name {{name}} is already in use by parent {{parent}}
pathInvalid: This appears to be an invalid path: {{path}}
propertyNotFound: {{name}} does not have a property named {{propName}}
?help:
Usage: help [command you want usage for]
Without an argument returns list of all commands
?cd:
Change default subject for commands
Usage: cd pathToObject
?info:
get information (class and path) about the subject or its properties
Usage: info [properties]
?get:
retrieve the value for a property
Usage: get propertyName
?read:
read commands from file
Usage: read filePath
?renameto:
renames the subject
Usage: renameto newName
?set:
sets a property value or removes if value not given
Usage: set propertyName [propertyValue]
?list:
list the children of subject
Usage: list [pattern_to_match_in_name]
?removechild:
deletes the named child from subject
Usage: removechild pathToChild
